sentence: But with the help of Charlen in concierge we got great reservations in different restaurants in the city
We were swimming in the ocean everyday before breakfast and in the afternoon in a calm water
Breakfast was a veritable feast and kept me going along with the complimentary high tea at 4 till dinner
Restaurant Cafe Taboras had great breakfast buffet with fresh cooked eggs any way you wanted smoked salmon huge range of options get this included in the room rate for best value
Breakfast was perfection and made for a wonderful start to each day
Also would like to comment on the Tabaras Restaurant lovely dining menu choice is good and the food is quality thank you Kirk Kirten
I had like to thank the team especially Roberta at the bar for her great service smile and Planters Punches best

We had decided to eat out most nights but attended the General Managers cocktail party on the Tuesday and the sumptuous gala style buffet that followed at around 150 bajan each it was great value and it is a shame the hotel do not have more success promoting this on the west coast as greater attendance would both boast the atmosphere and ensure that the vast display of food is consumed on the night
Spoil yourself and enjoy a cocktail either on your balcony or with fellow guests on the beautiful terrace bar area
We have tried 8 hotels on the Best west coast and this one has the best beach with breakfast served only a few steps from the sea
The beach bar can be frequented by
We did not eat in the restaurant after several disappointments with slow service and poor quality food in the past though the international buffet is usually good
Maybe if not there by lunch time vacant sunbeds are cleared
Nothing was too much troublefrom reception staff concierge beach club and restaurant staff not forgetting the guys and girls serving us drinks on the beach they were all a pleasure to be with
The Palm Terrace Restaurant at this hotel is closed until further notice but the hotel is keeping very quiet about this
The biggest let down at the hotel is the evening bar restaurant scene not sure lunchtime is any beterI feel sorry for the hotel as they put on live performers and the staff are great
Breakfast not well located and lacking in atmosphere
The Pavilion would be incomparable if the dining were remedied
I am not giving it 5 stars because we never had what I consider to be a good meal and also For the price we paid for our stay it failed to impress me
By 930 we were on our own in the restaurant and by 945 made to feel uncomfortable that we had the temerity to still be there
